cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futago

sentence.kanji: 友達に双子が生まれたよ。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi ni futago ga umareta yo
sentence.english: My friend gave birth to twins.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daku

sentence.kanji: 祖母がうちの猫を抱いているわよ。
sentence.romaji: sobo ga uchi no neko wo daite iru wa yo
sentence.english: Grandma's holding our cat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meiji

sentence.kanji: 祖父は明治の生まれです。
sentence.romaji: sofu ha meiji no umare desu
sentence.english: My grandfather was born in the Meiji era.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tearai

sentence.kanji: 風邪をひかないように手洗いとうがいをしましょう。
sentence.romaji: kaze wo hikanai you ni tearai to ugai wo shimashou
sentence.english: Make sure you wash your hands and gargle to avoid catching a cold.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ukaberu

sentence.kanji: お風呂に花を浮かべて入ったの。
sentence.romaji: ofuro ni hana wo ukabete haita no
sentence.english: I floated some flowers in the bath and then got in.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sennuki

sentence.kanji: 栓抜きはどこですか。
sentence.romaji: sennuki ha doko desu ka
sentence.english: Where's the bottle opener?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiromaru

sentence.kanji: その噂はすぐに広まったよ。
sentence.romaji: sono uwasa ha sugu ni hiromata yo
sentence.english: The rumor spread quickly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiromeru

sentence.kanji: 誰が噂を広めたんだろう。
sentence.romaji: dare ga uwasa wo hirometa n darou
sentence.english: Who spread the rumor?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakusai

sentence.kanji: 彼女は白菜の漬物が好きです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hakusai no tsukemono ga suki desu
sentence.english: She likes pickled nappa cabbage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keibetsu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は彼を軽蔑していたの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kare wo keibetsu shite ita no
sentence.english: She despised him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakayubi

sentence.kanji: 中指をドアに挟んでしまった。
sentence.romaji: nakayubi wo doa ni hasande shimata
sentence.english: I caught my middle finger in the door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ageru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は夕食に天ぷらを揚げました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha yuushoku ni tenpura wo agemashita
sentence.english: She fried some tempura for dinner.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は拳銃で撃たれたわ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kenjuu de utareta wa
sentence.english: He was shot with a handgun.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osamaru

sentence.kanji: 咳が少し治まりました。
sentence.romaji: seki ga sukoshi osamarimashita
sentence.english: My cough is a little better.

cards.english: meet, have the honor of seeing
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omenikakaru

sentence.kanji: お目に掛かれて嬉しいです。
sentence.romaji: omenikakarete ureshii desu
sentence.english: I am very pleased to meet you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aimai

sentence.kanji: 彼女は曖昧な返事をしたね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha aimai na henji wo shita ne
sentence.english: She gave a vague answer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hairu

sentence.kanji: 寒いので中に入ってください。
sentence.romaji: samui no de naka ni haite kudasai
sentence.english: It's cold so please come inside.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's deru

sentence.kanji: 今朝は早く家を出ました。
sentence.romaji: kesa ha hayaku ie wo demashita
sentence.english: I left the house early this morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jibun

sentence.kanji: 宿題は自分でやりなさい。
sentence.romaji: shukudai ha jibun de yarinasai
sentence.english: Do your homework by yourself.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dasu

sentence.kanji: 彼はかばんから教科書を出した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaban kara kyoukasho wo dashita
sentence.english: He took the textbook out of his bag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wakaru

sentence.kanji: 質問の意味は分かりましたか。
sentence.romaji: shitsumon no imi ha wakarimashita ka
sentence.english: Did you understand the meaning of the question?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tabun

sentence.kanji: 彼女は多分家で寝ています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha tabun ie de nete imasu
sentence.english: She's probably sleeping at home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's abiru

sentence.kanji: 私は朝、シャワーを浴びます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha asa shawa- wo abimasu
sentence.english: I take a shower in the morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ireru

sentence.kanji: 彼はかばんに手帳を入れた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaban ni techou wo ireta
sentence.english: He put the appointment book in his bag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hoshii

sentence.kanji: 僕は新しい靴が欲しいです。
sentence.romaji: boku ha atarashii kutsu ga hoshii desu
sentence.english: I want new shoes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juubun

sentence.kanji: お金はまだ十分あります。
sentence.romaji: okane ha mada juubun arimasu
sentence.english: We still have plenty of money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bun

sentence.kanji: このケーキはあなたの分です。
sentence.romaji: kono ke-ki ha anata no bun desu
sentence.english: This is your share of the cake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's deguchi

sentence.kanji: 出口はあそこです。
sentence.romaji: deguchi ha asoko desu
sentence.english: The exit's over there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daibu

sentence.kanji: 大分ピアノが上手くなりました。
sentence.romaji: daibu piano ga umaku narimashita
sentence.english: You've gotten pretty good at the piano.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yama

sentence.kanji: 山の空気はきれいだ。
sentence.romaji: yama no kuuki ha kirei da
sentence.english: The mountain air is clean.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iriguchi

sentence.kanji: 入り口は向こうです。
sentence.romaji: iriguchi ha mukou desu
sentence.english: The entrance is over there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's komu・komu

sentence.kanji: 電車が込んでいる。
sentence.romaji: densha ga konde iru
sentence.english: The train is crowded.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omoidasu

sentence.kanji: 大切な用事を思い出しました。
sentence.romaji: taisetsu na youji wo omoidashimashita
sentence.english: I just remembered something important I need to take care of.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hoshigaru

sentence.kanji: 子供がジュースを欲しがっています。
sentence.romaji: kodomo ga ju-su wo hoshigate imasu
sentence.english: My kid wants some juice.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omoide

sentence.kanji: 旅行で楽しい思い出ができました。
sentence.romaji: ryokou de tanoshii omoide ga dekimashita
sentence.english: I made wonderful memories during my trip.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nyuugaku

sentence.kanji: 妹は九月にアメリカの大学に入学します。
sentence.romaji: imouto ha kugatsu ni amerika no daigaku ni nyuugaku shimasu
sentence.english: My little sister's entering college in the United States in September.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wakareru

sentence.kanji: グループの中で意見が分かれました。
sentence.romaji: guru-pu no naka de iken ga wakaremashita
sentence.english: Opinion was divided within the group.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouen

sentence.kanji: 子供たちが公園で遊んでいる。
sentence.romaji: kodomotachi ga kouen de asonde iru
sentence.english: The children are playing in the park.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yunyuu

sentence.kanji: これはイタリアから輸入した服です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha itaria kara yunyuu shita fuku desu
sentence.english: These clothes are imported from Italy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yushutsu

sentence.kanji: 彼の会社は車を輸出しています。
sentence.romaji: kare no kaisha ha kuruma wo yushutsu shite imasu
sentence.english: His company exports cars.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dounyuu

sentence.kanji: 会社で新しいシステムを導入した。
sentence.romaji: kaisha de atarashii shisutemu wo dounyuu shita
sentence.english: A new system was introduced in the company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wakeru

sentence.kanji: お菓子をみんなで分けました。
sentence.romaji: okashi wo minna de wakemashita
sentence.english: We shared the sweets with everyone.

cards.english: go out, be about to go out
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dekakeru

sentence.kanji: 主人はもう出掛けました。
sentence.romaji: shujin ha mou dekakemashita
sentence.english: My husband has already gone out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hinode

sentence.kanji: 日の出がとてもきれいですね。
sentence.romaji: hinode ga totemo kirei desu ne
sentence.english: The sunrise is very beautiful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hinoiri

sentence.kanji: 今日の日の入りは午後6時でした。
sentence.romaji: kyou no hinoiri ha gogo 6 ji deshita
sentence.english: Today, the sun set at 6 p.m.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shutsujou

sentence.kanji: 今日は8チームが出場しました。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha hachi chi-mu ga shutsujou shimashita
sentence.english: Eight teams participated today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shukoku

sentence.kanji: 1週間後に出国します。
sentence.romaji: ishuukan go ni shukoku shimasu
sentence.english: I will leave the country in one week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uridasu

sentence.kanji: 新しい車が売り出された。
sentence.romaji: atarashii kuruma ga uridasareta
sentence.english: A new car was on sale.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nyuushi

sentence.kanji: 明日は高校の入試です。
sentence.romaji: ashita ha koukou no nyuushi desu
sentence.english: The high school entrance exam is tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shishutsu

sentence.kanji: 今月のわが家の支出は15万円です。
sentence.romaji: kongetsu no wagaya no shishutsu ha juugomanen desu
sentence.english: Our household expenses are 150,000 yen this month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaishutsu

sentence.kanji: 午後は外出の予定です。
sentence.romaji: gogo ha gaishutsu no yotei desu
sentence.english: I plan to go out this afternoon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoku

sentence.kanji: あまり欲を出しちゃだめだよ。
sentence.romaji: amari yoku wo dashi cha dame da yo
sentence.english: Don't be too greedy.
